ygData.subject: At the Pod
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ramulus grins at Spears. No problem. He stops as they reach the pod. Here it is. The door slides open, Ramulus standing aside for Spears to enter.

::Ramulus::

Ramulus grins at Spears. "No problem."

He stops as they reach the pod. "Here it is." The door slides open, Ramulus 
standing aside for Spears to enter. "After you."
